message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It offers unparalleled value and benefits that I believe you would greatly appreciate. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we're offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $950000. This is a special opportunity to secure this product at a price that reflects its true worth while also providing you with significant savings.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. We understand your perspective and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your expectations while still ensuring a fair return for us, we would like to propose a price of $900000 for the product. This offer reflects a balance between the product's value and our business needs. We hope this proposal meets your requirements and looks forward to your consideration.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

We appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer to $875000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that takes into account both the product's value and the current market conditions. We believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement that respects both our business interests and your budget constraints.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $825000. I'm willing to go up to $825000, but I need to be careful with my budget. Can we meet at $825000?

Thank you for your feedback, Bob. We've reviewed our position and decided to offer the product at $850000. This price is reflective of the product's value and includes a slight adjustment based on your previous offer. We hope this revised proposal is more in line with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually satisfactory agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I can only go up to $825000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.

After thoughtful consideration, we've decided to offer the product at $840000. This price reflects a compromise that takes into account both the product's value and the competitive landscape. We believe this is a fair offer that respects your budget constraints while still ensuring a reasonable return for us. We hope this proposal will be acceptable and look forward to your positive response.
I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I can only offer $825000. If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to explore other options.
